H0.text: Light is the speed that no physical object can equal or exceed according to the special theory of relativity.

H1.text: Air is the speed that no physical object can equal or exceed according to the special theory of relativity.

H2.text: Energy is the speed that no physical object can equal or exceed according to the special theory of relativity.

H3.text: Weight is the speed that no physical object can equal or exceed according to the special theory of relativity.

A4.text: no information signal or material object can travel faster than light in vacuum
